entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as not being unique in a certain respect. He is described as having never known his team fly better.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the school house that Ron is part of. The match between Gryffindor and Ravenclaw will decide the championship.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is mentioned as the rival house of Gryffindor in the upcoming match.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having never known his team fly better and as being the captain of Gryffindor.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is mentioned as a house that will be behind Gryffindor if they lose by a hundred points in the match against Ravenclaw.

entities.name: championship
entities.description: The championship is mentioned as being still wide open and as being decided by the match between Gryffindor and Ravenclaw.

relationships.description: Gryffindor will compete against Ravenclaw in the upcoming match that will decide the championship.
Harry is the captain of Gryffindor.
